heading: Jumping Jacks
subheading: Increase heart rate, warm the body, and improve overall circulation with this simple full-body movement.

heading: Squats
subheading: Strengthen legs, glutes, and core muscles while improving balance, stability, and lower-body mobility effectively.

heading: Plank
subheading: Build strong core stability, support healthy posture, and improve overall body strength through static engagement.

heading: Lunges
subheading: Enhance leg strength, balance, and coordination while activating vital stabilizer muscles for daily movement.

heading: Push-ups
subheading: Strengthen upper body, activate core muscles, and support endurance using controlled, effective bodyweight movement.

heading: Light Jogging / Fast Walking
subheading: Boost cardiovascular health, increase stamina, and improve metabolism with gentle, sustainable daily movement.
